ComicInfo.Series: You Look Like Death: Tales from the Umbrella Academy
ComicInfo.Summary:
Gerard Way!
Klaus travels into the Void in search of the dead wife of the vampire chimp boss. While he's there, Klaus's author friend provides dangerous insight about want-to-be-starlet, Vivian. Vivian bombs a rehearsal, but it's the cast and crew that really suffer.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Gabriel Bá | 1 | B | Variant Cover | I.N.J. Culbard | 2 | C | Variant Cover | Weshoyot Alvitre | 3 |
